1.content: Who is the lionness that is going to be stuffed?
1.title: Who?

11.content: Who is the lioness/lion that is going to stuff her?
11.title: Nala

choices: He wants her to be big
111.content: Why does he stuff her?
111.title: Simba

1111.content: Simba and Nala were laying around inside Pride Rock while the rest of the pride is out doing whatever they want. Simba had noticed that Nala hadn't been eating lately and she was starting to get super skinny. He wanted her to be big and have a nice, big belly. He confronted her about it while they were laying together. "Nala?", Simba asked. "Yes?", Nala replied. "Can I stuff your belly? I've always liked big lionesses." Nala answered, "...
1111.title: He wants her to be big

11112.content: "No. I'm sorry Simba. I just don't want to be big." Simba had expected her to say that so he had prepared a backup plan. He had went to the Oasis and had gathered some vines. He then waited for Nala to take a nap and tied her forelegs to a rock inside the cave. She woke up about an hour later. She noticed that she couldn't move her forelegs. She then noticed they were tied to the wall. 5 minutes later, Simba walked in carrying a 2 ton hippo he had killed. She asked what that was for and he said that he was going to stuff her belly with the whole hippo. She was angry but more nervous. She was angry because he was going to stuff her. She was nervous because she thought that there was no way that her belly could hold a whole hippo. She was brought out of her thought when Simba ripped a hunk of meat off the hippo and shoved it down her throat. She felt it go down and settle in her belly. She was constanly force-fed meat for about 1/2 an hour. Her belly was swollen and she was in pain from all the meat in it. She felt like she was about to pop. She pleaded for Simba to stop but he ignored her. They were both interrupted when they heard pawsteps coming into the cave. They turned around to see...
11112.title: No

choices: She tells them about her stuffing (Flashback)
111123.content: They see Sarabi walking in. When she saw Nala, she gained a smirk on her face. She told them that Mufasa had done the same thing to her.
111123.title: Sarabi

12.content: Who is going to stuff her?
12.title: Kiara

info.brief_description: The lionesses from TLK start to get stuffed by others.
